title: Spacious 1 Bed Suite in Painted Lady-Duboce Park
brief_description: Charming one-bedroom suite in a beautifully restored Victorian house in the heart of Duboce Park neighborhood. Walking distance to Alamo Square's famous Painted Ladies and easy access to Golden Gate Park. Features modern amenities in historic setting with private patio access.
checkin_instructions: Self check-in with lockbox. Host will provide code and detailed instructions 24 hours before arrival.
other_notes: Maximum 4 guests, no pets allowed, no smoking inside but permitted on patio. Located in quiet residential area with excellent public transportation access.

communications.message:
Bogdan
Here's the info you need:

Two doors with the same code:
exterior doors#1 and interior door #2 = the last 6 digits of your contact phone number, then # .

Interior door #3 takes you into the unit: 2018# to open and then # to lock.

Also: The bathroom sink has a push down/up function. After you shower, turn on the fan for 15 min. Iif you feel chilly, there is also a heater function.
There are extra blankets and throws in the black cabinets. We will generally turn on the house heater for a short time in the morning...expect a heater noise; but, it will blow warm air into the unit. Additionally, there are space heaters to warm you up.
Do let us know if you have any problems and we will address them asap. We're just upstairs!

Let us know if you have any issues!

Terry and Ah Kit

Bogdan
One way to get here:
https://www.bart.gov/guide/airport/sfo
Bart train -8.50- to Civic Center, then Muni - N Car >outbound to Duboce and Noe....get off, x park and you're on Pierce St....we are a white house on the left.

Download the muni ap [SFMTA https://www.sfmta.com/getting-around/muni/fares/munimobile]

Other way to get here:
Uber: $ 40 or so....20-30 min. 59 Pierce St. SF

title: Charming Studio Heart of Waikiki
brief_description: Perfectly located studio apartment in the heart of Waikiki, just steps from the world-famous beach. Modern amenities with Hawaiian touches, kitchenette for light meals, and easy access to shopping, dining, and all Waikiki attractions. Ideal base for island exploration.
checkin_instructions: Contact host upon arrival for key pickup. Building has secure entry, host will provide access codes.
other_notes: Maximum 2 guests, no pets allowed. Quiet hours 9:00 PM - 8:00 AM. Beach equipment and local guidebooks provided.

title: LA's Loveliest In & Outdoor Spot, Super Location
brief_description: Unique indoor-outdoor living space in trendy Mid-City neighborhood. Features beautiful garden area, modern interior design, and excellent location with easy access to Beverly Hills, Hollywood, Santa Monica, and downtown LA. Perfect blend of urban convenience and relaxed atmosphere.
checkin_instructions: Self check-in with smart lock. Hosts will send access code and detailed house manual 24 hours before arrival.
other_notes: Maximum 2 guests, no pets allowed, no parties or events. Please conserve water and energy. Beautiful outdoor space perfect for morning coffee and evening relaxation.
